overview: This video presents Chapters 3 and 4 from the series. « The Spokesman » (aka « A Guide to be driven »)  investigates the online traces of John Cantlie, a British news reporter  who was kidnapped and appeared in several Islamic State's propaganda  videos. « My Crush was a Superstar » tracks a French ISIS fighter, Abu  Abdallah Guitone, through a trail of messages, videos and postings to  uncover his existence in both social media and reality. This leads to an  uncomfortable first-person exploration of the gender dynamics behind  ISIS recruitment strategies.
title: Bottled Songs 3 & 4
